column4: Hi all, I've installed apache 2.2 via synaptic, the service is started but http://localhost/ produced 'unable to connect' where should I be looking?
nix same deal. it's as if it isn't there.
try /etc/init.d/apache2 start, could be it just isn't ru nning
thanks. now I get an error message (No apache MPM package installed) which I will go fix.
